invocations.description: Iterates through settings entry in the given botSection, the values are stored in the variable e. You can then access its settings by calling getsetting or setsetting, passing e as first parameter. botSection possible values are 'Cavebot/Waypoints', 'Cavebot/SpecialAreas' and 'Targeting/Creatures'.
invocations.ex:
local labels = {}

foreach settingsentry e 'Cavebot/Waypoints' do
	local label = getsetting(e, 'Label')

	if label ~= '' then
		table.insert(label)
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: Will iterate through all waypoints and save all existing labels in the labels table.
